text: The Diana Initiative is a computer security conference based in Las Vegas, Nevada aimed at supporting women in cybersecurity/ The first Diana Initiative conference took place in 2017. The Diana Initiative was founded by Cheryl Biswas, Virginia Robbins, Pablo Breuer, Elizabeth Etherington and Michael Smith. Due to COVID-19, the 2020 conference will be held online 21–22 August during DEF CON. ==References== Category:Computer security conferences
title: The Diana Initiative
